domains.name: Time on Task
domains.description: Captures the extent to which the teacher provides a learning activity (Behavior 0.1) and students remain on task (Behavior 0.2) across three rapid snapshots (1–10 second scans at minutes 4–5, 9–10, and 14–15).

components.name: Teacher provides learning activity - 1st Snapshot
components.description: Teacher provides a learning activity to most students during the first snapshot (between 4:00–5:00 of the segment).

components.name: Students are on task - 1st Snapshot
components.description: Students' on-task behavior during the first snapshot (4:00–5:00 of the segment).

components.name: Teacher provides learning activity - 2nd Snapshot
components.description: Teacher provides a learning activity to most students during the second snapshot (between 9:00–10:00 of the segment).

components.name: Students are on task - 2nd Snapshot
components.description: Students' on-task behavior during the second snapshot (9:00–10:00 of the segment).

components.name: Teacher provides learning activity - 3rd Snapshot
components.description: Teacher provides a learning activity to most students during the third snapshot (between 14:00–15:00 of the segment).

components.name: Students are on task - 3rd Snapshot
components.description: Students' on-task behavior during the third snapshot (14:00–15:00 of the segment).

domains.name: Classroom Culture
domains.description: Captures the teacher's creation of an emotionally supportive environment and the management of student behavior through two elements: Supportive Learning Environment and Positive Behavioral Expectations.

components.name: Supportive Learning Environment
components.description: Overall rating of the supportive learning environment (Element 1).

components.id: The teacher treats all students respectfully
components.name: The teacher treats all students respectfully
components.description: Behavior 1.1 under SLE: Teacher's respectful tone and interactions.

components.name: The teacher uses positive language
components.description: Behavior 1.2 under SLE: Frequency and quality of positive feedback.

components.id: The teacher responds to students needs
components.name: The teacher responds to students needs
components.description: Behavior 1.3 under SLE: Responsiveness to material or emotional needs.

components.id: The teacher does not exhibit gender bias
components.name: The teacher does not exhibit gender bias
components.description: Behavior 1.4 under SLE: Equitable treatment and challenge of stereotypes.

components.name: Positive Behavioral Expectations
components.description: Overall rating of the teacher's setting and reinforcement of behavior norms (Element 2).

components.id: The teacher sets clear behavioral expectations
components.name: The teacher sets clear behavioral expectations
components.description: Behavior 2.1 under PBE: Clarity and specificity of expectations.

components.id: The teacher acknowledges positive student behavior
components.name: The teacher acknowledges positive student behavior
components.description: Behavior 2.2 under PBE: Recognition of students meeting or exceeding expectations.

components.name: The teacher redirects misbehavior
components.description: Behavior 2.3 under PBE: Prompt, clear redirection and reinforcement of norms.

domains.name: Instruction
domains.description: Assesses facilitation of lesson objectives, checks for understanding, feedback, and promotion of critical thinking.

components.name: Lesson Facilitation
components.description: Overall rating of lesson facilitation (Element 3).

components.id: The teacher explicitly articulates learning objectives
components.name: The teacher explicitly articulates learning objectives
components.description: Behavior 3.1 under Lesson Facilitation: Stating and referencing objectives.

components.id: The teacher's explanation of content is clear
components.name: The teacher's explanation of content is clear
components.description: Behavior 3.2 under Lesson Facilitation: Clarity and comprehensiveness of explanations.

components.id: The teacher makes connections in the lesson
components.name: The teacher makes connections in the lesson
components.description: Behavior 3.3 under Lesson Facilitation: Linking to prior knowledge and experiences.

components.id: The teacher models by enacting or thinking aloud
components.name: The teacher models by enacting or thinking aloud
components.description: Behavior 3.4 under Lesson Facilitation: Enacting steps with think-aloud.

components.name: Checks for understanding
components.description: Overall rating of checks for understanding (Element 4).

components.name: The teacher uses questions
components.description: Behavior 4.1 under Checks for Understanding: Effective questioning strategies.

components.name: The teacher uses prompts
components.description: Behavior 4.2 under Checks for Understanding: Prompts guiding thinking.

components.name: The teacher monitors most students
components.description: Behavior 4.3 under Checks for Understanding: Circulation and probing during activities.

components.name: Feedback
components.description: Overall rating of feedback (Element 5).

components.id: The teacher provides specific comments for misunderstandings
components.name: The teacher provides specific comments for misunderstandings
components.description: Behavior 5.1 under Feedback: Targeted feedback to clarify errors.

components.id: The teacher provides specific comments for successes
components.name: The teacher provides specific comments for successes
components.description: Behavior 5.2 under Feedback: Reinforcement of successes.

components.name: Critical Thinking
components.description: Overall rating of critical thinking promotion (Element 6).

components.name: The teacher asks open-ended questions
components.description: Behavior 6.1 under Critical Thinking: Teacher questioning to extend reasoning.

components.name: The teacher provides thinking tasks
components.description: Behavior 6.2 under Critical Thinking: Assignments requiring analysis or interpretation.

components.id: Students ask open-ended questions or perform thinking tasks
components.name: Students ask open-ended questions or perform thinking tasks
components.description: Behavior 6.3 under Critical Thinking: Student engagement in higher-order thinking.

domains.name: Socioemotional Skills
domains.description: Teaching practices that develop student autonomy, perseverance, and social–collaborative skills.

components.name: Autonomy
components.description: Overall rating of autonomy promotion (Element 7).

components.id: The teacher provides students with choices
components.name: The teacher provides students with choices
components.description: Behavior 7.1 under Autonomy: Meaningful choices tied to objectives.

components.id: The teacher provides students with opportunities to take meaningful roles
components.name: The teacher provides students with opportunities to take meaningful roles
components.description: Behavior 7.2 under Autonomy: Assigning central academic roles.

components.id: Students volunteer to participate in the classroom
components.name: Students volunteer to participate in the classroom
components.description: Behavior 7.3 under Autonomy: Student initiative in participation.

components.name: Perseverance
components.description: Overall rating of perseverance promotion (Element 8).

components.name: The teacher acknowledges students' efforts
components.description: Behavior 8.1 under Perseverance: Specific praise of effort.

components.id: The teacher has a positive attitude towards students' challenges
components.name: The teacher has a positive attitude towards students' challenges
components.description: Behavior 8.2 under Perseverance: Framing failure as learning and offering support.

components.name: The teacher encourages goal-setting
components.description: Behavior 8.3 under Perseverance: Promotion of short- and long-term goals.

components.name: Social & Collaborative Skills
components.description: Overall rating of social and collaborative skills promotion (Element 9).

components.name: The teacher promotes students' collaboration
components.description: Behavior 9.1 under Social & Collaborative Skills: Designing interdependent group tasks.

components.id: The teacher promotes students' interpersonal skills
components.name: The teacher promotes students' interpersonal skills
components.description: Behavior 9.2 under Social & Collaborative Skills: Teaching empathy, perspective-taking, and emotion regulation.
